Cadis Baptist Church Ruins | Abandoned Upstate
Explore Cadis Baptist Church in Rome, Pennsylvania, a Free Will Baptist landmark from 1834 now weathering away in the Endless Mountains.

Cadis Baptist Church is a rural Baptist church located in Rome, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1834, its congregation was initially known as the First Free Will Baptist Church of Windham. The church building was constructed in 1881 in the town of Mecca, retaining the same name.
A 19th-century Free Will Baptist church in rural Pennsylvania preserved in photographs before demolition.

The Cadillac House - Finger Lakes, NY | Abandoned Upstate

The Cadillac House is an abandoned farmhouse situated in the Finger Lakes Region of Upstate New York. Constructed in 1840, the house follows the Farmhouse Greek Revival Style. The name "The Cadillac House" stems from the presence of a forgotten Cadillac Eldorado found in the garage.

The Coliseum - Abandoned Roller Skating Rink - Ceres, New York

The Coliseum is an abandoned roller rink in Ceres, New York. Constructed in 1902, this brick structure served as a natural gas steam trolley powerhouse. Over the years, the structure hosted various businesses and venues before its role as the roller rink..
Abandoned Coliseum roller rink and former trolley powerhouse in Western New York

The Dog House (Abandoned Barndominium) - Owego, NY
The Dog House is an abandoned half-residence and half-barn located within a barn near in Owego, New York. The property's history traces back to 1870, with the barn itself constructed in 1948.

The Ransom House Folklore Site | Abandoned Upstate
Investigate the Ransom House in Tioga County, New York—a rural homestead tied to Underground Railroad lore and later home to a family print shop.
The Ransom House is an abandoned residence in Tioga County, New York. Once rumored to shelter the enslaved workers of Colonel William Ransom, it later housed Marvin and Beatrice Godfrey's print shop.
A Tioga County homestead layered with Underground Railroad folklore and mid-century printing history.
